meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Saudi Arabia.
meanings.sent1: In Saudi Arabia, you can buy many things with a riyal.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for riyals before traveling to Riyadh.
meanings.sent3: The riyal rolled off the table and into the piggy bank with a clink.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shiny riyal, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The riyal in his hand felt heavy with possibilities.

meanings.definition: A silver coin formerly used in Portugal and Brazil.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather showed me an old riyal from his collection.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a display of ancient riyals from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The riyal in the museum looked like a tiny piece of history.
meanings.sent4: The riyal gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting its rich past.
meanings.sent5: The riyal in the coin collection was a rare find.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Qatar.
meanings.sent1: She received her salary in Qatari riyals.
meanings.sent2: The price of the item was listed in riyals and dirhams.
meanings.sent3: The riyal in her wallet seemed to whisper tales of distant lands.
meanings.sent4: The riyal symbolized the economic stability of the country.
meanings.sent5: The shiny new riyal bill was crisp and fresh.
